info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McDowell and northwestern Rutherford Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Marion, or 7 miles southeast of Old Fort, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Old Fort, Glenwood, Sugar Hill, Thermal City, Fero and Union Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
